  • Rochelle Volk

    Wolf Point, MT

    After years of raising and training horses for years with no where decent to keep them besides a run in shed. Which is an improvement from the structures that were made from pallets and tarps in earlier years. With the lose of my job 8 years ago and not ever find another permant job just sporadic work has made it hard to fulfill my dream of having a decent barn for my 6 horses. Having a decent structure would help bring in customers to have horses trained and folks who are interested in breeding to my Grandson of Highbrow Cat stud would feel better with a shelter for their animals while they are here temporarily.

    Vote For Rochelle Volk
